scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 /lib/bootstrap/scss/bootstrap.scss dist/css/bootstrap.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 /lib/bootstrap/scss/bootstrap-grid.scss dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 /lib/bootstrap/scss/bootstrap-reboot.scss dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.css && npm run css-copy
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-grid.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
